org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc

Class RpcServer.Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer.Connection
  • Enclosing class:
    RpcServer

    public class RpcServer.Connection
extends Object
    Reads calls from a connection and queues them for handling.

      • readAndProcess

        public int readAndProcess()
                   throws IOException,
                          InterruptedException
        Read off the wire. If there is not enough data to read, update the connection state with what we have and returns.
        Returns:
        Returns -1 if failure (and caller will close connection), else zero or more.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • processRequest

        protected void processRequest(byte[] buf)

                              InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        buf - Has the request header and the request param and optionally encoded data buffer all in this one array.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
